titles.title: Offshore Safety Advisory Committee Act of 1988
A bill providing for the establishment of a National Offshore Vessel Operators Safety Advisory Committee.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior, DOT.
Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

bill.summary: 5/18/1988--Introduced. Offshore Safety Advisory Committee Act of 1988 - Establishes the National Offshore Vessel Operators Safety Advisory Committee to make recommendations to the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating regarding safety aspects of offshore oil, gas, and other mineral operations.
